verses.text: \w To|strong="G1909"\w* \w sum|strong="G2774"\w* \w up|strong="G1722"\w* \w what|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w been|strong="G2192"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*: \w Such|strong="G5108"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* high priest \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w we|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w*, \w one|strong="G3739"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w has|strong="G2192"\w* \w taken|strong="G2523"\w* \w his|strong="G1909"\w* \w seat|strong="G2523"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w right|strong="G1188"\w* \w hand|strong="G1188"\w* \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w throne|strong="G2362"\w* \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w God|strong="G3004"\w*’\w s|strong="G2192"\w* \w Majesty|strong="G3172"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*,

\w where|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* serves \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* sanctuary, \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w true|strong="G3588"\w* \w tent|strong="G4633"\w* \w set|strong="G2532"\w* \w up|strong="G2532"\w* \w by|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w by|strong="G2532"\w* \w man|strong="G3739"\w*.

\w Every|strong="G3956"\w* \w high|strong="G3956"\w* \w priest|strong="G4374"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w appointed|strong="G2525"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w purpose|strong="G3739"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w offering|strong="G1435"\w* \w gifts|strong="G1435"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="G2378"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w God|strong="G2532"\w*; \w it|strong="G2532"\w* follows, \w therefore|strong="G3606"\w*, \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w high|strong="G3956"\w* \w priest|strong="G4374"\w* \w must|strong="G5100"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w offering|strong="G1435"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w make|strong="G1519"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w*, \w however|strong="G3767"\w*, still \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w he|strong="G3588"\w* \w would|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3761"\w* \w even|strong="G3761"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w priest|strong="G2409"\w*, \w since|strong="G2596"\w* \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* already \w priests|strong="G2409"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w offer|strong="G4374"\w* \w the|strong="G1909"\w* \w gifts|strong="G1435"\w* \w as|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G1909"\w* \w Law|strong="G3551"\w* directs.

(\w These|strong="G3956"\w* priests, \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w true|strong="G3588"\w*, \w are|strong="G3588"\w* engaged \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w service|strong="G3000"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w only|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w copy|strong="G5262"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w shadow|strong="G4639"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w heavenly|strong="G2032"\w* realities, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w shown|strong="G1166"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* directions given \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w about|strong="G3195"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* construct \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w tent|strong="G4633"\w*. “\w Look|strong="G3708"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w*,” \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w words|strong="G2532"\w*, “\w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w make|strong="G4160"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w part|strong="G2596"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w accordance|strong="G2596"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w pattern|strong="G5179"\w* \w shown|strong="G1166"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w mountain|strong="G3735"\w*.”)

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G1510"\w*, \w as|strong="G3745"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* see, \w has|strong="G3748"\w* \w obtained|strong="G5177"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w ministry|strong="G3009"\w* \w as|strong="G3745"\w* far excelling theirs, \w as|strong="G3745"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w covenant|strong="G1242"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w intermediary|strong="G3316"\w*, based, \w as|strong="G3745"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w*, \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w better|strong="G2909"\w* \w promises|strong="G1860"\w*, excels \w the|strong="G2532"\w* former \w covenant|strong="G1242"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w* covenant \w had|strong="G1510"\w* \w been|strong="G1510"\w* faultless, \w there|strong="G1063"\w* \w would|strong="G1510"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* \w been|strong="G1510"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w occasion|strong="G5117"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w second|strong="G1208"\w*.

\w But|strong="G2532"\w*, \w finding|strong="G3201"\w* \w fault|strong="G3201"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w people|strong="G3004"\w*, \w God|strong="G3004"\w* \w says|strong="G3004"\w* – “‘\w A|strong="G2532"\w* \w time|strong="G2250"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w coming|strong="G2064"\w*,’ \w says|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, ‘\w When|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* ratify \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w new|strong="G2537"\w* \w covenant|strong="G1242"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w people|strong="G3004"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w people|strong="G3004"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w Judah|strong="G2455"\w* –

\w Not|strong="G3756"\w* \w such|strong="G3588"\w* \w a|strong="G1722"\w* \w covenant|strong="G1242"\w* \w as|strong="G1722"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w made|strong="G4160"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w their|strong="G1438"\w* \w ancestors|strong="G3962"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w when|strong="G1722"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w took|strong="G1949"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w lead|strong="G1806"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w land|strong="G1093"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* Egypt. \w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* \w did|strong="G4160"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w abide|strong="G1696"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w their|strong="G1438"\w* \w covenant|strong="G1242"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*, \w and|strong="G3962"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* disregarded \w them|strong="G3588"\w*,’ \w says|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

‘\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w covenant|strong="G1242"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w make|strong="G1303"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*,’ \w says|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*. ‘\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* impress \w my|strong="G1325"\w* \w laws|strong="G3551"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w their|strong="G1438"\w* \w minds|strong="G1271"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* inscribe \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w their|strong="G1438"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w their|strong="G1438"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w my|strong="G1325"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*.

\w There|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w need|strong="G1321"\w* \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w anyone|strong="G3956"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* instruct \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w fellow|strong="G4177"\w* \w citizen|strong="G4177"\w*, \w or|strong="G2532"\w* \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w person|strong="G1538"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* relatives “\w Learn|strong="G1321"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*”; \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w everyone|strong="G3956"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*, \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* lowest \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* highest.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w merciful|strong="G2436"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* wrongdoings, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w longer|strong="G2089"\w* \w remember|strong="G3403"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* sins.’”

\w By|strong="G1722"\w* \w speaking|strong="G3004"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w new|strong="G2537"\w* covenant, \w God|strong="G3004"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* once renders \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w former|strong="G4413"\w* covenant \w obsolete|strong="G3822"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* whatever becomes \w obsolete|strong="G3822"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* loses its force \w is|strong="G3588"\w* virtually annulled.
